post.body:
Threewave Software is hiring!

Threewave Software, based in beautiful downtown Vancouver is after a Lead Designer and Three Game / Level Designers! We’re looking for people with Unreal, Radiant or equivalent engine experience to utilize the latest iD technology on one project in development. We’re also working on a new IP using Source Engine; on top of this, we have two additional undisclosed Multiplayer First Person Shooter projects in development!


Check out our website @ http://www.threewavesoftware.com for more details about these exciting opportunities. Please apply through jobs@threewavesoftware.com to the attention of Kathy Gibson, Director of HR.
